game.name: Pixel Empires
game.categories: Single-player, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Pixel Empires is a pixel-art real-time strategy game where you build and manage medieval colonies, automate resource gathering with intuitive AI, explore uncharted lands, and wage tactical battles to expand your empire’s reach.
